# Dominican Republic at the 2019 World Beach Games

Dominican Republic  competed at the inaugural World Beach Games in Doha, Qatar from 12 to 16 October 2019. In total, athletes representing Dominican Republic won one bronze medal and the country finished in 32nd place in the medal table.
